The three ships set down, a mist is sent through the air, covering 
all three ships freezing almost imediately. Now camoflauged the ships 
were invisible to sight. The Pilots emerge from thier individual 
sections.

The first to emerge is a brown and red bot wearing a scratched up 
maximal symbol.
"Well we're here, now what?"

The second, a female bot with golden eyes, a brown shining metal 
body, and white feathers, wings draped around her shoulders, and a 
silver feathered crown covering her brow in a cloak like way.
"My father will tell you when he regains his strength Foxfingers, 
until then scan this world for usefull Translife forms"

The third form limped into sight as a half bot half bat form, it's 
fur covered wings wrapped around him like a cape, keeping him warm.
"It's alright daughter, I'll be fine with a little rest. In the 
meantime I want the two of you to set up my lab and search for 
deserving life. "If you're done before I awaken I want you to study 
your history lessons. Most of all remember our goal, TILL ALL ARE ONE"
